Name: Expresso Espresso
About the game: FROM THE GROUND-UP Construct your cafe from the ground up! From the very foundation to the furniture your customers will sit on, the customization to change style and theme of your store is endless! COFFEE CREATION Carefully craft your coffee items while analyzing the expenses and profits for each drink! Manage what kind of employees you wish to hire in order for your store to come to life! HIRE EMPLOYEES Manage your employees for each role! Each employee has their own skills, experience, and personality that would ultimately affect your customers moods! Choose carefully and manage carefully! WISHLIST TODAY!
